short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Premium extension with essential features for Trello.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Trello Plus is your go-to Chrome extension for enhancing your Trello productivity. Designed with all Trello users in mind, this extension brings a host of valuable features to make your Trello boards even more efficient and enjoyable.

Key Features:

- Card ID Numbers: Gain better control and organization with the display of unique ID numbers for each card on your Trello board. Quickly identify and reference cards, streamlining your workflow like never before. Color of the card numbers can be set in the extension options.

- List Customization: Tailor your Trello board to your exact needs by effortlessly hiding or collapsing lists of your choice. Focus on what matters most and declutter your workspace with just a click.

- Smart Sidebar: Experience a seamless browsing experience with our innovative sidebar functionality. The sidebar is conveniently hidden until you need it, effortlessly revealing itself with a simple mouse hover. Hover functionality can be enabled in the extension options.
